issue.title: www.canva.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.canva.com/templates/?category=tACZCnDMHu8&filters=eyJBIjoiTUBXZXRnOEtldzMxdDBGUSIsIkE%2FIjoiQiJ9](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.canva.com%2Ftemplates%2F%3Fcategory%3DtACZCnDMHu8%26filters%3DeyJBIjoiTUBXZXRnOEtldzMxdDBGUSIsIkE%252FIjoiQiJ9) ### Comment Username: @bbbreaddd > When pressing the filter button, nothing shows up until disabling "AdGuard – Mobile App Banners" in uBlock Origin. > I tested in incognito mode to disable other extensions and I disabled every filter on uBlock Origin except for "AdGuard – Mobile App Banners". > I also tested chrome and had the same results. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/klf95jclfb44s44kkos80480s4o88ocmofoq6o3180.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/jraqbiitydc4wko4skkkwc484sk0cwsj4esc95wpog.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | uBlock Origin Browser: | Firefox Filters: | Annoyances:
AdGuard Mobile App Banners
